feed.title: THE SUN: LIVING WITH OUR STAR
feed.address: Exhibition Road, South Kensington, London SW7 2DD
feed.openingTime: Open daily: 10.00–18.00 (last entry 17.15). Galleries start to close 30 minutes before the museum closes. Closed: 24–26 December
feed.station: The nearest tube station is South Kensington. This is on the District, Circle and Piccadilly lines and is a 5-minute walk from the Museum.
feed.description: Spectacular interactive experiences, unique artefacts and stunning imagery shed fresh light on humanity's relationship with our closest star in the Science Museum's latest exhibition.
